byline: Adam Allington, Mitchell Hartman and David Brancaccio
description: Airing on Tuesday December 30, 2014: First up on today's show, stock markets in Europe are down again on Tuesday, influenced by the general election that’s on the way in Greece. More on that. Plus, we'll talk about healthcare trends in 2014 and 2015. We focus on hospitals buying up physician practices.

title: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday December 30, 2014
